hero.subtitle: Make informed investment decisions with our advanced compound interest calculator. Visualize growth scenarios, compare strategies, and build confidence in your financial journey.

features.title: Your Complete Financial Planning Suite
features.subtitle: Advanced tools and analytics to help you make informed investment decisions with confidence
features.advancedCalculatorDesc: Precise compound interest calculations with customizable parameters for any investment scenario
features.visualAnalyticsDesc: Interactive charts and graphs that bring your investment projections to life
features.goalPlanningDesc: Set financial targets and see exactly what it takes to achieve your investment goals

calculator.title: Financial Growth Planner
calculator.subtitle: Enter your investment details below to see how your money can grow over time with compound interest
calculator.sliderDescription: Drag the slider to see how different time horizons affect your investment growth

share.title: Share This Calculation

export.title: Export Your Calculation

footer.description: Transform your financial planning with our advanced growth projection platform. Analyze investment scenarios, visualize compound growth, and make data-driven decisions for your financial future.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

meta.title: About Us - Future Value Investment Calculator
meta.description: Learn about our mission to democratize financial planning with accurate, accessible investment calculation tools.
meta.keywords: about, financial planning, investment calculator, future value, mission, team

hero.title: About Our Mission
hero.description: We're dedicated to democratizing financial planning by providing accurate, accessible, and transparent investment calculation tools for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Financial planning shouldn't be a privilege reserved for the wealthy. We believe everyone deserves access to powerful, accurate tools that help them understand the potential of their investments and plan for their financial future.

features.calculatorDesc: Advanced future value calculations with compound interest

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: Everything we build is guided by these fundamental principles.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your financial data stays in your browser. We don't track, store, or share your personal calculations.

accuracy.title: Mathematical Precision
accuracy.description: Every calculation is based on proven financial formulas with real-time market data for currency conversions.

accessibility.title: Universal Access
accessibility.description: Free tools available in multiple languages, designed to work on any device, anywhere in the world.

technology.title: Built with Modern Technology
technology.description: Fast, reliable, and secure platform powered by industry-leading technologies.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions, suggestions, or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
